titleStmt.title: By the King and Queen, a proclamation William R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Prohibits trade between England and Ireland without specific royal permission.
At end of text: Given at our court at Hampton-Court, the sixth day of June, 1689.
